resources.string: Manage files, update phone software and connect via WiFi. The most common protocol for communication with Windows computers. This mode is enabled by default.
Manage files and update phone software. The most common way to connect phones with media devices such as TVs, car kits and MAC OS/Linux computers lacking MTP support.
Only SD card supported in mass storage mode (MSC). Internal storage not available in this mode. Continue?
Turn on Wi-Fi first, then pair your phone with other devices by using a USB cable.

"The configuration process needs to create a file in your internal storage root directory named with your computer. There's already a file or folder with the same name in your internal storage root directory, please rename it or delete it then try again."
